ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Storm Shadow, Snake Eyes, Granny Demon and Zartan prevent Cobra forces from breaking into the Community Center where the Brainwave Scanner is found. In Darklonia, Roadblock, Spirit and Grosz outfight the pursuing Blue Ninjas. Dawn cannot force Doctor Mindbender to remove Snake Eyes' memories so she places him into the Brainwave Scanner as punishment. Wade and his wife are freed and the intruders depart; Dr. Venom's mind enters Dr. Mindbender's body through the Brainwave Scanner.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 15:55:46. [CVDB596805] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:35:03. [Issue ID 1708581]
